scripts.build: yarn run link:engine && yarn run link:compiler && node scripts/build
scripts.link:engine: (cd ../packages/raptor-engine && yarn unlink; yarn link) && yarn link raptor-engine
scripts.link:compiler: (cd ../packages/raptor-compiler && yarn unlink; yarn link) && yarn link raptor-compiler
scripts.link:rollup-plugin: (cd ../packages/rollup-plugin-raptor-compiler && yarn unlink; yarn link) && yarn link rollup-plugin-raptor-compiler
